statement.p: The maintenance department at the main campus of a large state university receives daily requests to replace fluorecent lightbulbs. The distribution of the number of daily requests is bell-shaped and has a mean of 63 and a standard deviation of 8. Using the 68-95-99.7 rule, what is the approximate percentage of lightbulb replacement requests numbering between 63 and 87?
Do not enter the percent symbol.
